subject: Hockey, Ice
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ryan Nugent-Hopkins and Ryan Strome scored in the first period, helping Canada beat the United States, 2-1, to advance to the next round at the junior world championships in Ufa, Russia.
snippet: Ryan Nugent-Hopkins and Ryan Strome scored in the first period, helping Canada beat the United States, 2-1, to advance to the next round at the junior world championships in Ufa, Russia.
